medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 2 months ago with diarrhea associated with fecal incontinence alternating with constipation. The patient experienced significant weakness and was unable to climb out of the tub for roughly 4 hours before being found. New abdominal pain developed shortly after admission.
